name: IBM HTTP Server V8.5.5 Liberty ready on a single virtual machine - Amazon EC2
description: This template deploys IBM HTTP Server V8.5.5 on a single virtual machine ready for use with WebSphere Liberty Server.

metadata.displayName: IBM HTTP Server V8.5.5 Liberty ready on a single virtual machine
metadata.longDescription: This template deploys IBM HTTP Server V8.5.5 on a single virtual machine ready for use with WebSphere Liberty Server.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
Ubuntu 16.04
Ubuntu 14.04

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1 virtual machine:
IBM HTTP Server instance

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description:
IBM HTTP Server for WebSphere Application Server V8.5.5
IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition V8

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM HTTP Server V8.5.5 - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSEQTJ_8.5.5/com.ibm.websphere.ihs.doc/ihs/welcome_ihs.html
3. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
